kochi koso shou-shou koshou wo gochisou da sou to

2005-03-11

こちこそ少々胡椒をご馳走だそうと。
(I also say a little pepper is probably a feast: the Japanese tongue-twister I made today.)

another thought: this is the season for getting back in touch with people
